name: Space Litter Disposal Service
description:
A 2D top-down game where the goal is to collect as much debris as possible by running into them. Made over the weekend for the UM CSSA Game Jam 2022.

Collecting debris increase your score and once you reach the maximum, you win! Be careful to not run out of fuel!

Collaborators:

LBD Community - https://lbd-community.itch.io/

Music -  https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/space-harmony
